p: The above work was followed by the use of imidazolium-based IL bearing the dicyanamide anion [bmim][DCA], by the same researchers [ 41], to study the electrochemical behaviour of UO 2 2+. The cathodic peaks corresponding to the reduction of UO 2 2+ to UO 2 + and then to UO 2 were clearly detected, indicating that [bmim][DCA] is a good solvent for this lanthanide cation.
